Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 59th overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1980...
Had first career hit on 5/6/1985, off Ray Barnett (BC)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/19/1985, off James Locher (Min)...
Released by Plum Grove on 5/26/1987...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 6/16/1987 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1988, hitting .458 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Released by Gashouse on 6/9/1989...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 7/20/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $300,000 per year...
Injured on 6/24/1990 with a Torn Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Capital City on 3/1/1991 to a minor league contract.
Released by Capital City on 6/23/1991...
